decision_conditions: The proposed non-material amendments to 214899FUL dated 26.11.2021 can be ACCEPTED as non-material amendments, in accordance with section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990), Government Guidance Greater flexibility for planning permissions (2010) and the Ealing Council Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following a grant of Planning Permission (2011).
description: Application for a Non Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission 214899FUL dated 26.11.2021 for 'Construction of a two storey residential building with habitable roof space to provide eight self-contained units, with associated amenity space, off-street vehicle parking, refuse and cycle storage; alteration to front and rear of property involving hard and soft landscaping'. This application seeks permission to add a ground floor side window to the western flank elevation.
